title: Montessori Teaching - Music, Arts and Gadgets
headline: Learn to build a love for art, music and digital gadgets in Montessori children in this free online course.
description: This short course is designed to teach you about the role of art, music and devices in promoting Montessori children's physical, mental and cognitive abilities. After enrolling in this course, you will discover how to build a strong base in art and music in children's lives with the help of engaging activities. In addition, you will learn safe and meaningful ways of introducing children to digital devices, gadgets and the internet.

courseDescription:
We cannot deny art and music's role in human evolution. People like Leonardo da Vinci, Mozart and Michelangelo have been pioneers in their fields. These individuals created masterpieces not only because of their immense interest and fondness for art, music and sculpture: their environments enriched their abilities, providing them with the needed stimuli.

If we want to cultivate more great artists today, we must provide children with the foundations to emulate them. They can design and erect buildings and dabble in the aesthetic arts, crafts and vibrant music. When building foundations in these cultural domains, no other approach is better than the Montessori method. This course is designed to help you learn about various activities through which you can help Montessori children develop strong foundations in these fields. We have divided the content of this course into four topics, each with its own focus and questions to help cement your understanding.

Apart from covering arts, crafts and music, the course also enables you to introduce Montessori children to digital devices without violating any rules of Montessori teaching. By taking this course, you will acquire practical strategies with which you can make the use of these devices and gadgets more meaningful and safe for children. Enrol today and become confident in helping children explore their creative interests and passions.
